definition: how (wonderful etc)/what (a great idea etc)/however (difficult it may be etc)/(in interrogative sentences) how (much etc)/to what extent
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
suffix, used to form interrogative 什麼|什么[shen2 me5], what?, indefinite 這麼|这么[zhe4 me5] thus, etc

sentences.english: The new Air Force chiefs were talking about how awesome drones were.
sentences.chinese: 空军的新首长正在谈论无人驾驶飞机是多么厉害。

sentences.english: I wish U'd unclench Ur fists.
sentences.chinese: 我多么希望你能松开你的双拳。

sentences.english: You can discover the language how friability and the disability .
sentences.chinese: 你就会发现语言多么的脆弱和无力。

sentences.english: I had done a better job in the final examination!
sentences.chinese: 我多么希望在期末考试时考出好成绩。

sentences.english: Remember how excited you were when you built your first useful program?
sentences.chinese: 记得您在构建第一个有用的程序时是多么兴奋吗？

sentences.english: For a moment he reflected on how much he loved this godson.
sentences.chinese: 一会儿，他仔细想他多么爱这个教子。

sentences.english: No matter what hurdles are placed in our way, somehow we always find a way.
sentences.chinese: 不管我们事业上有多么困难，我们总会设法闯过去。

sentences.english: After seeing how vulnerable these scripts are to hackings and holes.
sentences.chinese: 在看出这些脚本对黑客和漏洞是多么脆弱之后。

sentences.english: Once, home appliance enterprise of China, how does longing have his heart.
sentences.chinese: 曾经，中国的家电企业，多么渴望有自己的心脏。

sentences.english: No matter how difficult English may be, you should do your best to learn it.
sentences.chinese: 不管英语有多么难，你都应该尽你最大的努力来学它。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete  bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

sentences.english: How still the bells in steeples stand.
No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多么坚贞，也敌不过下半身的软弱。

sentences.english: No matter how small, I will celebrate my successes today.
sentences.chinese: 不管多么小，我都会为我今天的成功庆功。

sentences.english: We all know how important typography is.
Unsurprisingly, the reaction he received from passers-by was one of complete bewilderment.
sentences.chinese: 不出所料的是，当时与他擦身而过的人是多么的困惑。

definition: so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
very/completely/utterly/extremely/absolutely/hundred percent/to divide into ten equal parts
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
